comment: Great experience! Easy to donate and love the transparency in showing where the funds are going.
The donation process was straightforward. It would be helpful to have more options for recurring donations.
I faced some issues with the payment gateway. Please improve the user interface for a smoother experience.
Fast and secure donation platform. I appreciate the prompt acknowledgment receipt.
Confusing navigation. It took me a while to figure out how to donate to a specific cause.
